Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Troy in 1979...
Traded from Troy to Halifax on 2/5/1985 (Going to TRO: SS S. Alvarado. Going to HAL: 1B D. Audet, P L. Zabala)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1985, hitting .375 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1985, hitting .333 with 9 HR, 36 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Capital City on 6/5/1986...
Drove in 7 runs against Troy on 6/30/1986...
Traded from Halifax to New Jersey on 7/17/1986 (Going to NJ: 1B D. Audet. Going to HAL: LF R. Arceniaga, P S. Olmos)...
Drove in 6 runs against Gashouse on 5/29/1987...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1989, hitting .352 with 6 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
